name: Egocupio
tag_list: egocupio, online-community, make-a-wish, fulfill-a-wish, network, socialnetwork, profiles, online-presence
overview:
Egocupio is an online community that allows you to share and express your wishes, make other peopleâ€™s wishes come true , keep in touch with your friends and acquaintances, meet new friends and even businesses.

By taking part you can create an online presence in a community of users that is here for the common goal of helping and making people in this world happier.

Make a wish Make as many wishes as you dream of in any category. By sharing your wish, someone may connect with you and fulfill it for you. You can also search for members that have posted what they would like to fulfill for others, by using our search tool on the site. Perhaps they can make your wish come true!

Fulfill a wish Fulfill other members wishes. Post and share wishes that you would like to fulfill for others. You can also search through membersâ€™ wishes with our site search tool. You may fulfill as many wishes as youâ€™d like in any category.

Keep in touch Keep in touch with your family members, friends and business colleagues

Make new social and business connections Meet new friends. Find individuals and businesses with common interests as you and make new social and business connections.

Companies and Businesses You can find more information about companies and businesses at: http://www.egocupio.com/businessInfo.aspx
